channel.title: Very Buggy Server
channel.description: So I was on this 508 and sometimes when I put stuff in my bank everything in my bank would turn X1000. Then theres this boss called Crazay Santa and after I killed him I got Unlimited HP so no one could kill me. There is many bugs on it, I am asking if there's any possible dupe or a way to get Unlimited HP again. This is only to get payback at someone because they bugged there AGS to hit 90s on my so I can't kill him anymore!!! He also cleaned me -_- Don't say I shouldn't dupe on servers or cheat. I just want an answer. You can't drop or trade. Well you can trade but you can't take your items out. Once you tell me a working dupe I will remove the post so no one will know about it.

item.title: Very Buggy Server
item.dc:creator: @SpectralX SpectralX
item.description:
@SpectralX wrote:

   So I was on this 508 and sometimes when I put stuff in my bank everything in my bank would turn X1000. Then theres this boss called Crazay Santa and after I killed him I got Unlimited HP so no one could kill me. There is many bugs on it, I am asking if there's any possible dupe or a way to get Unlimited HP again. This is only to get payback at someone because they bugged there AGS to hit 90s on my so I can't kill him anymore!!! He also cleaned me -_- Don't say I shouldn't dupe on servers or cheat. I just want an answer. You  can't drop or trade. Well you can trade but you can't take your items out. Once you tell me a working dupe I will remove the post so no one will know about it.
